information: Clément Faugier at Privas in the Ardèche: we've been producing and selling all chestnut based products since 1882: : chestnut ice cream, Ardèche chestnut cream. We produce and sell Marpom's, a mix of chestnut cream and mashed potato. Range of organic products. Clément Faugier now provides frozen fruit and vegetable puree, plain portionable frozen chestnut purée, in the form of 8 or 15 pallets.
